column5: My home has been described as warm and welcoming. Enjoy a nice sized bedroom, incredibly comfortable full sized mattress, large bathroom, and a very peaceful backyard to relax after a long day of sightseeing. Come and experience Austin! I am happy to share all the best places to explore in Austin. Special Notes: 3 Dogs & 2 cats live here, please be pet friendly. My home is non-smoking, both indoor & outdoor. Best to have a car if staying in my home or use a ride-share.
